column4: Hey, does anyone know how to force a resolution on a display so that it either scrolls or stretches it? it works in windows, I've tried xorg and xrandr to no avail
Can anyone help me setting up my laptop to display 1024x768 instead of 1024x600? intel graphics on eeepc
can your eepc even support that resolution?
does under windows. it just stretches the display
